content.question: In the poem as a whole, the heat symbolically represents

choices.label: the relentless natural forces demolishing the city
the intensity of the tourists’ desire to experience the city
an enduring threat to the peace of mind of the squirrel
an environment of hardship surrounding the squirrel’s song

content.answer: an environment of hardship surrounding the squirrel’s song

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Identify and explain the function of a symbol.
